message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.HC, cs.IR 

The paper introduces a new large-scale video dataset for human action recognition, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The dataset is used to train models for action recognition, which falls under machine learning (cs.LG) and multimedia (cs.MM). The dataset is also relevant to human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and information retrieval (cs.IR) as it can be applied to research in various home tasks such as nursing, caring, and security.
